description: I needed help moving my studio to another location. Most of the movers were already booked but I ran across Bo's ad in a local paper. I gave him a call, the price was reasonable so I hired him. When he arrived, I noticed he had a huge bulge in his jeans that could not be overlooked. I tried to focus on the moving which we did very promptly. 'I am finished with this job and now it is time for you to pay' he said.
title: Blowing Bo
